snippet: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton began a six-nation visit to Asia by saying that the United States would broaden its presence in the region, but that “the Pacific is big enough for all of us.”
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton began a six-nation visit to Asia by saying that the United States would broaden its presence in the region, but that “the Pacific is big enough for all of us.”

headline.seo: On Asia Trip, Clinton Tries to Ease Tension With China
headline.main: Clinton Begins Asia Trip, Trying to Ease Tension With China
headline.print_headline: Clinton Begins Asia Trip, Trying to Ease Tension With China
